page.title: 12Holiday Survey
page.content: We did a survey on{holidays}with 100 third and fourth years of Bleak Hill Primary school.38 children from the school went to France on a school { {holiday.} Who had one {holiday ? }42 Who had more than one{holiday ? } 72 Who had a{holiday}in Britain? 66 Who had a{holiday}abroad? 63 Who had both types of{holiday}? 45 What kind of accomodation did you have? Tents 24 Caravan 32 Hotels 54 Self catering 41 Who had more than one{holiday} abroad? 23 Who is staying with relatives? 29 Foreign countries visited are Germany, France, Spain, Italy, Jersey, Greece, Portugal, Yugoslavia and Tunisia.
